TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MemoryStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 建立支援的存放區為記憶體的資料流。

span.span: Creates a stream whose backing store is memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料流的目前位置是可以進行下一個讀取或寫入作業的位置。The current position of a stream is the position at which the next read or write operation could take place. 目前的位置可以擷取或設定透過方法。The current position can be retrieved or set through the method. 新執行個體時建立時，目前位置設為零。When a new instance of is created, the current position is set to zero. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] 建立具有不帶正負號的位元組陣列的記憶體資料流提供不可調整大小的資料流。Memory streams created with an unsigned byte array provide a non-resizable stream of the data. 當使用位元組陣列時，您可以不附加或壓縮資料流，雖然您可以修改現有的內容，根據傳入建構函式的參數。When using a byte array, you can neither append to nor shrink the stream, although you might be able to modify the existing contents depending on the parameters passed into the constructor. 空的記憶體資料流可調整大小，並可寫入及讀取。Empty memory streams are resizable, and can be written to and read from. 如果物件加入至 ResX 檔或.resources 檔，請呼叫方法在執行階段擷取它。If a object is added to a ResX file or a .resources file, call the method at runtime to retrieve it. 如果物件序列化為資源檔，實際上會序列化為。If a object is serialized to a resource file it will actually be serialized as an . 此行為可提供更佳的效能，以及能夠取得的指標將資料直接管理，而不需方法。This behavior provides better performance, as well as the ability to get a pointer to the data directly, without having to go through methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入資料做為備份存放區使用的記憶體。The following code example shows how to read and write data using memory as a backing store. [!code-cpp[System.IO.MemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CPP/memstream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CS/memstream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/VB/memstream.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Sub New ()
public: MemoryStream();

summary.span: 使用初始化為零的可擴展容量，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an expandable capacity initialized to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性都設為`true`。The , , and properties are all set to `true`. 當您使用時，自動會增加目前資料流的容量方法來設定為值的長度大於目前資料流的容量。The capacity of the current stream automatically increases when you use the method to set the length to a value larger than the capacity of the current stream. 這個建構函式會公開基礎資料流，其中傳回。This constructor exposes the underlying stream, which returns.

span.span: The array of unsigned bytes from which to create the current stream.

summary.span: 根據指定的位元組陣列，初始化 類別之不可調整大小的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new non-resizable instance of the class based on the specified byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性都設為`true`。The , , and properties are all set to `true`. 設定為指定的位元組陣列的長度。 is set to the length of the specified byte array. 新的資料流可以寫回，但不是可調整大小。The new stream can be written to, but is not resizable. 資料流的長度不能設定的值大於指定的位元組陣列; 的初始長度不過，可以截斷資料流 (請參閱)。The length of the stream cannot be set to a value greater than the initial length of the specified byte array; however, the stream can be truncated (see ). 這個建構函式不會公開基礎資料流。This constructor does not expose the underlying stream. 擲回。 throws .

summary.span: 使用初始化為指定的可擴展容量，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with an expandable capacity initialized as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和屬性都設為`true`。The , , and properties are all set to `true`. 當您使用時，會自動會增加容量方法來設定為值的長度大於目前資料流的容量。The capacity automatically increases when you use the method to set the length to a value larger than the capacity of the current stream. 除了`MemoryStream`byte [] 參數所建構，寫入結尾處的作業`MemoryStream`展開`MemoryStream`。Except for a `MemoryStream` constructed with a byte[] parameter, write operations at the end of a `MemoryStream` expand the `MemoryStream`. 這個建構函式會公開基礎資料流，傳回。This constructor exposes the underlying stream that returns. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定配置給這個資料流的位元組數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of bytes allocated for this stream.

value.span: 資料流緩衝區可使用部分的長度。

span.span: The length of the usable portion of the buffer for the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Capacity` 是系統提供的位元組陣列的緩衝區長度。`Capacity` is the buffer length for system-provided byte arrays. `Capacity` 無法設定為小於目前的資料流長度的值。`Capacity` cannot be set to a value less than the current length of the stream. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.IO.MemoryStream#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CPP/memstream.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryStream#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CS/memstream.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryStream#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/VB/memstream.vb#5)]

The current stream is closed.

span.span: is invoked on a stream whose capacity cannot be modified.

summary.span: 使用指定的緩衝區大小和取消語彙基元，以非同步的方式從目前資料流讀取所有位元組，並將其寫入另一個資料流。

span.span: Asynchronously reads all the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size and cancellation token.

returns.span: 表示非同步複製作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
is .
is negative or zero.

span.span: Either the current stream or the destination stream is disposed.

exception.span: 目前資料流不支援讀取，或目的資料流不支援寫入。

span.span: The current stream does not support reading, or the destination stream does not support writing.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 覆寫 方法，以便不執行任何動作。

span.span: Overrides the method so that no action is performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫方法。This method overrides the method. 因為任何資料寫入物件會寫入的 RAM，這個方法是多餘的。Because any data written to a object is written into RAM, this method is redundant.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用來監視是否有取消要求的語彙基元。

span.span: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

summary.span: 非同步清除這個資料流的所有緩衝區，並監視取消要求。

span.span: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示非同步排清作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為任何資料寫入物件會寫入的 RAM，這個方法是多餘的。Because any data written to a object is written into RAM, this method is redundant. 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含值屬性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 您可以藉由建立的執行個體建立的取消語彙基元類別，並傳遞屬性做為`cancellationToken`參數。You can create a cancellation token by creating an instance of the class and passing the property as the `cancellationToken` parameter.

span.span: The stream has been disposed.

summary.span: 傳回用於建立這個資料流之不帶正負號位元組的陣列。

span.span: Returns the array of unsigned bytes from which this stream was created.

returns.span: 位元組陣列 (建立這個資料流的來源) 或基礎陣列 (如果沒有在目前執行個體的建構期間將位元組陣列提供給 建構函式)。

span.span: The byte array from which this stream was created, or the underlying array if a byte array was not provided to the constructor during construction of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，緩衝區會包含配置的位元組，這可能是未使用。Note that the buffer contains allocated bytes which might be unused. 例如，如果字串為"test"會寫入物件、 從傳回的緩衝區長度是 256，不 4，與未使用需要 252 個位元組。For example, if the string "test" is written into the object, the length of the buffer returned from is 256, not 4, with 252 bytes unused. 若要取得在緩衝區中的資料，請使用方法; 不過，在記憶體中建立一份資料。To obtain only the data in the buffer, use the method; however, creates a copy of the data in memory. 也可以是緩衝區`null`。The buffer can also be `null`. 若要建立`MemoryStream`使用公開可見的緩衝區時，使用的執行個體， ，或。To create a `MemoryStream` instance with a publicly visible buffer, use , , or . 如果目前資料流是可調整大小，兩個呼叫此方法不會傳回相同的陣列如果呼叫之間調整基礎位元組陣列的大小。If the current stream is resizable, two calls to this method do not return the same array if the underlying byte array is resized between calls. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For additional information, see . > [!NOTE] > 這個方法適用於當記憶體資料流已關閉。This method works when the memory stream is closed.

exception.span: 執行個體沒有使用公開可見的緩衝區來建立。

span.span: The instance was not created with a publicly visible buffer.

Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 offset 和 (offset + coun - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前資料流 的字元取代的指定位元組陣列。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the characters read from the current stream.

param.name: offset
param.span: 「緩衝區」中以零為起始的位元組位移，用來開始儲存讀取自目前資料流的資料。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing data from the current stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 從目前的資料流讀取位元組區塊，並且將資料寫入緩衝區。

span.span: Reads a block of bytes from the current stream and writes the data to a buffer.

returns.span: 寫入至緩衝區的總位元組數。

span.span: The total number of bytes written into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前無法提供那麼多的位元組數目，則這個數目可能小於所要求的位元組數目，或如果在讀取任何資料之前已經到達資料流末端，則為零。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached before any bytes are read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . `offset`參數會提供中的第一個位元組的位移`buffer`来寫入目前資料流的哪些資料。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the first byte in `buffer` to which data from the current stream is written. `count`參數指定要從目前資料流讀取的位元組數目上限。The `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes to read from the current stream. 如果已到達資料流結尾，傳回的值會是個位元組，則為零的實際數目。The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached. 如果在讀取的作業成功，讀取的位元組數目進階資料流中目前的位置。If the read operation is successful, the current position within the stream advances by the number of bytes read. 如果發生例外狀況，資料流中目前的位置維持不變。If an exception occurs, the current position within the stream remains unchanged. `Read`方法會傳回零，只有當資料流結尾為止。The `Read` method will return zero only if the end of the stream is reached. 在其他情況下，`Read`一律會讀取至少一個位元組資料流後再傳回。In all other cases, `Read` always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning. 根據定義，如果沒有資料可用的呼叫時，資料流`Read`、`Read`方法會傳回的零 （自動到達資料流末端）。By definition, if no data is available from the stream upon a call to `Read`, the `Read` method returns zero (the end of the stream is reached automatically). 實作可以自由地傳回比要求的位元組更少，即使尚未達到資料流結尾。An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. 使用讀取基本資料型別。Use for reading primitive data types. > [!CAUTION] > 如果在指定的位元組陣列`buffer`參數為基礎所傳回的緩衝區方法中，陣列內容會覆寫，而且會擲回任何例外狀況。If the byte array specified in the `buffer` parameter is the underlying buffer returned by the method, the array contents are overwritten, and no exception is thrown. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.IO.MemoryStream#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CPP/memstream.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryStream#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/CS/memstream.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryStream#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.MemoryStream/VB/memstream.vb#7)]

summary.span: 以非同步的方式從目前資料流讀取一連串的位元組、依所讀取的位元組數目進階資料流中的位置，以及監視取消要求。

span.span: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream, advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 參數的值會包含讀取至緩衝區的位元組總數。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前可供使用的位元組數目少於所要求的數目，結果值可能會小於所要求的位元組數目，或者如果已經到達資料流末端，則可能為 0 (零)。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含值屬性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 您可以藉由建立的執行個體建立的取消語彙基元類別，並傳遞屬性做為`cancellationToken`參數。You can create a cancellation token by creating an instance of the class and passing the property as the `cancellationToken` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 如果在讀取的作業成功，資料流中目前的位置被進階由 1 個位元組。If the read operation is successful, the current position within the stream is advanced by one byte. 如果發生例外狀況，將資料流中目前的位置不變。If an exception occurs, the current position within the stream is unchanged. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. param.name: offset

span.span: The new position within the stream.

param.name: loc

span.span: A value of type , which acts as the seek reference point.

summary.span: 將目前資料流中的位置設定為指定的數值。

span.span: Sets the position within the current stream to the specified value.

returns.span: 資料流中的新位置，是組合初始的參考點和位移計算出來的。

span.span: The new position within the stream, calculated by combining the initial reference point and the offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 支援搜尋到的任何位置超出資料流的長度。Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported. 請勿使用方法，以判斷資料流中的新位置，如果初始化以非零位移。Do not use the method to determine the new position in the stream if the was initialized with a non-zero offset. 如果您這樣做，會傳回不正確的值。If you do, will return an inaccurate value. 請改用屬性來取得資料流的新位置。Instead, use the property to get the new position of the stream. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetLength (long value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetLength(int64 value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetLength (value As Long)
public: override void SetLength(long value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要設定長度的數值。

span.span: The value at which to set the length.

summary.span: 將目前資料流的長度設定為指定的數值。

span.span: Sets the length of the current stream to the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 如果指定的值小於目前資料流的長度，則會截斷資料流。If the specified value is less than the current length of the stream, the stream is truncated. 如果資料流中目前的位置是結尾的資料流，截斷之後方法會傳回-1，方法會讀取提供的位元組陣列的零個位元組和和附加方法指定在資料流，並增加其長度結尾處的位元組。If after the truncation the current position within the stream is past the end of the stream, the method returns -1, the method reads zero bytes into the provided byte array, and and methods append specified bytes at the end of the stream, increasing its length. 如果指定的值大於目前的容量，而且可調整大小的資料流，增加容量，並將資料流中目前的位置不會變更。If the specified value is larger than the current capacity and the stream is resizable, the capacity is increased, and the current position within the stream is unchanged. 如果長度增加時，舊之間的新長度的資料流的內容會初始化為零。If the length is increased, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are initialized to zeros. > [!NOTE] > A執行個體必須支援寫入，此方法才能運作。A instance must support writing for this method to work. 使用屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。Use the property to determine whether the current instance supports writing. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For additional information, see .

exception.span: 目前的資料流不是可調整大小的，並且 大於目前的容量。

span.span: The current stream is not resizable and is larger than the current capacity.
-or-

span.span: is negative or is greater than the maximum length of the , where the maximum length is( - origin), and origin is the index into the underlying buffer at which the stream starts.

A new byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會省略中的未使用的位元組陣列中。This method omits unused bytes in from the array. 若要取得完整的緩衝區，請使用方法。To get the entire buffer, use the method. 這個方法會傳回內容的複本做為位元組陣列。This method returns a copy of the contents of the as a byte array. 如果目前的執行個體上提供的位元組陣列建構，則會傳回一份此執行個體可存取陣列的區段。If the current instance was constructed on a provided byte array, a copy of the section of the array to which this instance has access is returned. 請參閱建構函式，如需詳細資訊。See the constructor for details. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法適用於當已關閉。This method works when the is closed.

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 寫入的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to write.

summary.span: 使用讀取自緩衝區的資料，將位元組區塊寫入至目前的資料流。

span.span: Writes a block of bytes to the current stream using data read from a buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . `offset`參數會提供中的第一個位元組的位移`buffer`、 寫入和`count`參數會提供要寫入的位元組數目。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the first byte in `buffer` to write from, and the `count` parameter gives the number of bytes to write. 如果作業成功時，寫入的位元組數目進階資料流中目前的位置。If the write operation is successful, the current position within the stream is advanced by the number of bytes written. 如果發生例外狀況，將資料流中目前的位置不變。If an exception occurs, the current position within the stream is unchanged. 除了`MemoryStream`byte [] 參數所建構，寫入結尾處的作業`MemoryStream`展開`MemoryStream`。Except for a `MemoryStream` constructed with a byte[] parameter, write operations at the end of a `MemoryStream` expand the `MemoryStream`. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 以非同步的方式將一連串的位元組寫入目前的資料流，由這個資料流中目前的位置前移寫入的位元組數目，並且監視取消要求。

returns.span: 表示非同步寫入作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含值屬性。If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the value for the property. 您可以藉由建立的執行個體建立的取消語彙基元類別，並傳遞屬性做為`cancellationToken`參數。You can create a cancellation token by creating an instance of the class and passing the property as the `cancellationToken` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開啟目前的資料流時，這個方法相當於呼叫上此資料流的基礎緩衝區。When the current stream is open, this method is equivalent to calling on the underlying buffer of this stream.
